attributes.additional_details:
The BBC for some time has become a far left Marxist globalist propaganda machine presenting anti British fake news on a daily basis. 

The BBC does not represent the majority of the British public around the UK and has become the most refined fake news propaganda outlet on the planet.
attributes.background:
Begin the immediate defunding of the BBC, current efforts to defund the BBC by 2027 are not good enough. 

We demand the defunding process to be complete by Jan 1st 2021.
